title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: When the SWT.MULTI option is selected in the ControlExampleText, there is an unexpected beep sound. This behavior is not intended.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: Instead of the beep sound, I expect there to be no sound or a different feedback sound.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText.
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Click on other buttons in the ControlExampleText.
